body:
nit:
```suggestion
The getutxos endpoint allows querying the UTXO set given a set of outpoints.
```
diff_hunk:
@@ -89,10 +89,12 @@ Only supports JSON as output format.
 * softforks : (array) status of softforks in progress
 
 #### Query UTXO set
-`GET /rest/getutxos/<checkmempool>/<txid>-<n>/<txid>-<n>/.../<txid>-<n>.<bin|hex|json>`
+`GET /rest/getutxos/<TXID>-<N>/<TXID>-<N>/.../<TXID>-<N>.<bin|hex|json>`
+`GET /rest/getutxos/checkmempool/<TXID>-<N>/<TXID>-<N>/.../<TXID>-<N>.<bin|hex|json>`
 
-The getutxo command allows querying of the UTXO set given a set of outpoints.
-See BIP64 for input and output serialisation:
+The getutxos endpoint allows querying of the UTXO set given a set of outpoints.

@@ -89,10 +89,12 @@ Only supports JSON as output format.
 * softforks : (array) status of softforks in progress
 
 #### Query UTXO set
-`GET /rest/getutxos/<checkmempool>/<txid>-<n>/<txid>-<n>/.../<txid>-<n>.<bin|hex|json>`
+`GET /rest/getutxos/<TXID>-<N>/<TXID>-<N>/.../<TXID>-<N>.<bin|hex|json>`
+`GET /rest/getutxos/checkmempool/<TXID>-<N>/<TXID>-<N>/.../<TXID>-<N>.<bin|hex|json>`
 
-The getutxo command allows querying of the UTXO set given a set of outpoints.
-See BIP64 for input and output serialisation:
+The getutxos endpoint allows querying of the UTXO set given a set of outpoints.

body: I agree with @shaavan on adding a line break here (and for https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/REST-interface.md#blocks; may as well sneak it into the commit if you agree).
diff_hunk:
@@ -89,10 +89,12 @@ Only supports JSON as output format.
 * softforks : (array) status of softforks in progress
 
 #### Query UTXO set
-`GET /rest/getutxos/<checkmempool>/<txid>-<n>/<txid>-<n>/.../<txid>-<n>.<bin|hex|json>`
+`GET /rest/getutxos/<TXID>-<N>/<TXID>-<N>/.../<TXID>-<N>.<bin|hex|json>`
+`GET /rest/getutxos/checkmempool/<TXID>-<N>/<TXID>-<N>/.../<TXID>-<N>.<bin|hex|json>`

body:
Optionally, could put the url into "BIP64" and replace the colon at the end of the sentence with a full stop.

(FWIW "serialisation" isn't incorrect; IIRC it's the English spelling except in North America. That said, the North American spelling seems dominant here in the project.)
diff_hunk:
@@ -89,10 +89,12 @@ Only supports JSON as output format.
 * softforks : (array) status of softforks in progress
 
 #### Query UTXO set
-`GET /rest/getutxos/<checkmempool>/<txid>-<n>/<txid>-<n>/.../<txid>-<n>.<bin|hex|json>`
+`GET /rest/getutxos/<TXID>-<N>/<TXID>-<N>/.../<TXID>-<N>.<bin|hex|json>`
+`GET /rest/getutxos/checkmempool/<TXID>-<N>/<TXID>-<N>/.../<TXID>-<N>.<bin|hex|json>`
 
-The getutxo command allows querying of the UTXO set given a set of outpoints.
-See BIP64 for input and output serialisation:
+The getutxos endpoint allows querying the UTXO set given a set of outpoints.
+With the /checkmempool/ option the mempool is also taken into account.
+See BIP64 for input and output serialization (relevant for `bin` and `hex` output formats):
 https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0064.mediawiki

body:
Thanks for the thorough review and the suggestions @shaavan and @jonatack. I took all of them and updated the PR description accordingly. Force-pushed with the following changes: - add line breaks via `
` between the two variants both in the blocks and the getutxos endpoint sections - put a motivation/description of the changes into the commit body (mostly taken over from the PR description) - link to BIP64 within the text instead of only showing bare URL
Agree that this is a good opportunity to also fix this for the blocks section. Done.
diff_hunk:
@@ -89,10 +89,12 @@ Only supports JSON as output format.
 * softforks : (array) status of softforks in progress
 
 #### Query UTXO set
-`GET /rest/getutxos/<checkmempool>/<txid>-<n>/<txid>-<n>/.../<txid>-<n>.<bin|hex|json>`
+`GET /rest/getutxos/<TXID>-<N>/<TXID>-<N>/.../<TXID>-<N>.<bin|hex|json>`
+`GET /rest/getutxos/checkmempool/<TXID>-<N>/<TXID>-<N>/.../<TXID>-<N>.<bin|hex|json>`

body: Good idea, done. Also add a motivation hint in PR description and the commit body on why "serialization" is preferred over "serialisation" (I agree that it is not incorrect from a language perspective and the reason for change is only consistency).

-See BIP64 for input and output serialisation:

+With the /checkmempool/ option the mempool is also taken into account.
+See BIP64 for input and output serialization (relevant for `bin` and `hex` output formats):
 https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0064.mediawiki

body:
Markdown is supposed to be readable as plain text.

Make this a list instead?
diff_hunk: @@ -36,7 +36,7 @@ By default, this endpoint will only search the mempool. To query for a confirmed transaction, enable the transaction index via "txindex=1" command line / configuration option. #### Blocks -`GET /rest/block/.` +`GET /rest/block/.`

@@ -89,11 +89,13 @@ Only supports JSON as output format. * softforks : (array) status of softforks in progress #### Query UTXO set -`GET /rest/getutxos//-/-/.../-.` +`GET /rest/getutxos/-/-/.../-.`
+`GET /rest/getutxos/checkmempool/-/-/.../-.` -The getutxo command allows querying of the UTXO set given a set of outpoints. -See BIP64 for input and output serialisation: -https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0064.mediawiki +The getutxos endpoint allows querying the UTXO set given a set of outpoints.

body:
Right, this also explains why there is no other instance of `
` in any of our Markdown docs. Changed it to a list (here an for the blocks endpoint), as you suggested.
diff_hunk: @@ -36,7 +36,7 @@ By default, this endpoint will only search the mempool. To query for a confirmed transaction, enable the transaction index via "txindex=1" command line / configuration option. #### Blocks -`GET /rest/block/.` +`GET /rest/block/.`

body: Took the suggestions by jonatack (https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24467#discussion_r820273828) and luke-jr (https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24467#discussion_r821251526) and force-pushed.

It would be better to write /checkmempool/ under the `code` tag, as this is part of a line of code and would help make it adequately visible with other text around.

```suggestion
With the `/checkmempool/` option, the mempool is also taken into account.
```
diff_hunk:
@@ -89,11 +89,13 @@ Only supports JSON as output format.
 * softforks : (array) status of softforks in progress
 
 #### Query UTXO set
-`GET /rest/getutxos/<checkmempool>/<txid>-<n>/<txid>-<n>/.../<txid>-<n>.<bin|hex|json>`
+- `GET /rest/getutxos/<TXID>-<N>/<TXID>-<N>/.../<TXID>-<N>.<bin|hex|json>`
+- `GET /rest/getutxos/checkmempool/<TXID>-<N>/<TXID>-<N>/.../<TXID>-<N>.<bin|hex|json>`
 
-The getutxo command allows querying of the UTXO set given a set of outpoints.
-See BIP64 for input and output serialisation:
-https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0064.mediawiki
+The getutxos endpoint allows querying the UTXO set, given a set of outpoints.
+With the /checkmempool/ option, the mempool is also taken into account.

body: Thanks, I agree that this improves the visibility. Done.

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#16545](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16545) (refactor: Implement missing error checking for ArgsManager flags by ryanofsky)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
